<rule id="javaee-pom-to-quarkus-00040" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <xmlfile in="pom.xml" matches="/m:project[not(m:build/m:plugins/m:plugin/m:artifactId/text() = 'maven-surefire-plugin') or                 m:build/m:plugins/m:plugin/m:artifactId[text() = 'maven-surefire-plugin' and not(../m:configuration/m:systemPropertyVariables/m:java.util.logging.manager/text() = 'org.jboss.logmanager.LogManager')]]">
                    <namespace prefix="m" uri="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0"/>
                </xmlfile>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="1" title="Adopt Maven Surefire plugin">
                    <message>
                    <![CDATA[
                        Use the Maven Surefire plugin adding the following sections to the `pom.xml` file:  

                        ```xml
                        <properties>  
                            <surefire-plugin.version>3.0.0</compiler-plugin.version>
                        </properties>  
                        <build>
                            <plugins>
                                <plugin>
                                    <artifactId>maven-surefire-plugin</artifactId>
                                    <version>${surefire-plugin.version}</version>
                                    <configuration>
                                        <systemPropertyVariables>
                                            <java.util.logging.manager>org.jboss.logmanager.LogManager</java.util.logging.manager>
                                            <maven.home>${maven.home}</maven.home>
                                        </systemPropertyVariables>
                                    </configuration>
                                </plugin>
                            </plugins>
                        </build>
                        ```
                    ]]>
                    </message>
                    <link href="https://quarkus.io/guides/maven-tooling#build-tool-maven" title="Quarkus - Guide"/>
                </hint>
            </perform>
        </rule>
